title: Aimersoft DVD Ripper v1.1.14 + Keygen
description:
Aimersoft DVD Ripper v1.1.14
----------------------------------

Aimersoft DVD Ripper is all-in-one, easy-to-use and super fast DVD ripping software. This best DVD ripping software can rip a DVD to AVI, DVD to MP4, DVD to MPEG easily, so you can transfer DVD to iPod, put DVD on iPhone/Zune/PSP/Apple TV and other devices you like.

Aimersoft DVD Ripper is the best DVD conversion software, which can convert your DVD to almost all popular video and audio formats including MP4, AVI, WMV, MOV, MPG, MPEG, 3GP, 3GPP, MPG, ASF, FLV, VOB, WMA, M4A, MP3, you can get video files of any format with this DVD Ripping software.

Key Functions

- With the great DVD Ripping software, you can easily convert DVD to various video and audio format, such as rip DVD to AVI, rip DVD to DivX, XviD, AVI, rip DVD to WMV (Windows Media Player), MP4, MOV (Quick Time), RM, RMVB (Real Player), FLV(Youtube), MPG, MPEG, 3GP, 3GPP, ASF, VOB, H.264, M4V, MP3, WMA, M4A, AAC, WAV, etc.

- Powerful Video editing, Aimersoft DVD Ripper allows you to trim the excrescent or special parts of movies, adjust brightness, contrast, audio, etc, .And check the audio track or caption of videos as you like.

- Aimersoft DVD Ripper allows you to merge and split DVD. Join several chapters into one file, also can rip and copy DVD by chapters you want.

DVD Ripper Web Site: http://www.aimersoft.com/dvd-ripper.html
Scanned with Kaspersky Internet Security 7.0
